RelatedSentence: On the day when nationwide anti-China protests had been expected to burst in Vietnam , local residents spent just another quiet weekend as usual but under tightened security both on the streets and on the Internet .
Vietnamese rioters have rampaged into hundreds of foreign factories in Ha Tinh Province and three provinces near Ho Chi Minh City in the south since May 13 during violent protests .
Related violence has left two Chinese killed and more than 100 injured .
The protests came after Vietnamese ships and personnel repeatedly harassed the normal operations by a Chinese oil company in undisputed waters in the South China Sea .
